title: Quest NetVault Backup Server Process Manager Service NVBUBackupOptionSet Get Method SQL Injection Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on vulnerable installations of Quest NetVault Backup. Authentication is not required to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the handling of NVBUBackupOptionSet Get method requests. The issue results from the lack of proper validation of a user-supplied string before using it to construct SQL queries. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to execute code in the context of the underlying database.
timeline:
2017-12-06 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2017-12-15 - Coordinated public release of advisory
credit: Brian Gorenc - Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative
